entity

Class User

  • entity.User
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Bean, EventAware, Retireable, Validatable

    public class User
implements Bean, Validatable, Retireable, EventAware
    Internal system users.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      boolean AccountLocked
      Property that indicates whether user's account is locked. Reading this property requires User.view permission. The property is writable, if you have User.edit permission, and can be used to lock or unlock the user account
      List<Object> AllGroupUsers
      Returns all GroupUser entities *from the database* that point to this user. To retrieve GroupUsers that are only in the bundle as well, try getAllGropuUsersAsArray() on the product's User implementation.
      GroupUser[] AllGroupUsersAsArray
      Set<Object> AllGroups
      Returns a Set of all the groups to which this user belongs or has admin rights to.
      AttributeUser[] Attributes
      Attributes for the user.
      User BackupUser
      Returns the backup user for this user
      Key BackupUserId
      Returns the ID of the backup user for this user
      UserBackup[] BackupUsers
      Backup users for this user. Though this is an array, users can only have one backup user.
      Integer BeanVersion
      Auto-incremented object version
      UserContact Contact
      Contact entry related to the user.
      Date CreateTime
      Timestamp when the object was created
      User CreateUser
      User who created the object
      Credential Credential
      Security credential for the user.
      Country DefaultCountry
      User's default country
      PhoneCountryCode DefaultPhoneCountry
      User's default phone country
      String Department
      User's department within the company.
      UserExperienceType ExperienceLevel
      Experience level of the user.
      Boolean ExternalUser
      If true, the user is an external user, and claims assigned to the user should be treated as externally owned.
      GroupUser[] GroupUsers
      Groups associated with this user.
      Key ID
      Internally managed primary key
      Integer IntegerExt
      integer extension; default value of '12'
      String JobTitle
      User's job title.
      LanguageType Language
      User's preferred language.
      Long LoadCommandID
      LoadCommand for load where row was created. If not null this object was loaded via the loader.
      LocaleType Locale
      User's preferred locale.
      MeasurementSystem MeasurementSystemPreference
      Measurement System Preference
      IQueryBeanResult<Activity> OpenActivities
      A QueryProcessor with all open activities assigned to this user.
      int OpenActivityCount
      Count of all open activities assigned to this user.
      UserSettings OrCreateUserSettings
      Creates a UserSettings instance for this user.
      Organization Organization
      Each user should belong to exactly one organization
      String PublicID
      ID or primary key of the row in the external system to which this row is mapped
      UserRegion[] Regions
      Regions associated with this user.
      Long RetiredValue
      Whether the entity is still in use. A value of 0 means that the entity is not retired. If the entity is retired from active use, this field has a non-zero value equal to the entity's ID. Once an entity is retired, it should not be unretired.
      UserRole[] Roles
      Security roles granted to the user.
      Group RootGroup
      Return the root group for this user
      boolean SafeToDelete
      Tests if the user can be safely deleted. Returns false if The user is the super user The user is the "default owner", used as the assignee of last resort by the assignment system The user supervises any groups Any items are assigned to the user
      List<SecurityZone> SecurityZones
      Returns a list of all the security zones that this user can currently see (is assigned to a group)
      Integer SessionTimeoutSecs
      User's session timeout value in seconds
      boolean SupportingVacationingUsers
      Returns true if there are users that are on vacation and are backed by current user.
      boolean SystemUser
      Indicates whether or not this user is a system user, indicated by the SystemUserType field on User
      SystemUserType SystemUserType
      Indicates the type of special system users (for example, default claim owner). This is null for regular users.
      TimeZoneType TimeZone
      User's time zone.
      boolean UnrestrictedUser
      Indicates whether or not this user is the super user that should be granted all permissions.
      Date UpdateTime
      Timestamp when the object was last updated
      User UpdateUser
      User who last updated the object
      Boolean UseHelperLabels
      Should the helper labels be displayed?
      UserSettings UserSettings
      Settings for this user (formerly known as preferences).
      VacationStatusType VacationStatus
      The vacation status of this user.
      Key[] VacationingUsers
      Returns an array containing the IDs of all users that are on vacation and are backed up by this user.
      ValidationLevel ValidationLevel
      Validation level that this object passed (if any) before it was stored.
      static PublicUserUtil util

      boolean isInOrganization(Organization organization)
      void remove()
      Removes the user from the system, in the process removing (retiring) its Credential and Contact records. Also sets any claims/exposures/activities that are pending assignment to this user to no longer have an assigned user
      void removeFromAttributes(AttributeUser element)
      Removes an instance of entity.AttributeUser from the Attributes array.
      void removeFromAttributes(Key elementID)
      Removes an instance of entity.AttributeUser having id elementID from the Attributes array by retiring the element.
      void removeFromBackupUsers(UserBackup element)
      Removes an instance of entity.UserBackup from the BackupUsers array.

      Removes an instance of entity.UserBackup having id elementID from the BackupUsers array by retiring the element.

      Removes an instance of entity.UserRegion from the Regions array.

      Removes an instance of entity.UserRegion having id elementID from the Regions array by retiring the element.
      void removeFromRoles(UserRole element)
      Removes an instance of entity.UserRole from the Roles array.
      void removeFromRoles(Key elementID)
      Removes an instance of entity.UserRole having id elementID from the Roles array by retiring the element.
      boolean restrictedToOwnOrg()
      Returns true if this user is restricted to viewing only his organizations objects.
      void setAccountLocked(boolean locked)
      Property that indicates whether user's account is locked. Reading this property requires User.view permission. The property is writable, if you have User.edit permission, and can be used to lock or unlock the user account
      void setBackupUser(User value)
      Sets the backup user for this user
      void setBackupUserId(Key value)
      Sets the ID of the backup user for this user
      boolean syncRoles(String[] roleNames)
      Sets the role on the user based on the role names being passed in, and remove all the old roles. This method will compare all the role names but will ignore all the roles that are not found

      • RootGroup

        Group RootGroup
        Return the root group for this user

      • SafeToDelete

        boolean SafeToDelete
        Tests if the user can be safely deleted. Returns false if
        • The user is the super user
        • The user is the "default owner", used as the assignee of last resort by the assignment system
        • The user supervises any groups
        • Any items are assigned to the user

      • SecurityZones

        List<SecurityZone> SecurityZones
        Returns a list of all the security zones that this user can currently see (is assigned to a group)

      • SupportingVacationingUsers

        boolean SupportingVacationingUsers
        Returns true if there are users that are on vacation and are backed by current user.

      • SystemUser

        boolean SystemUser
        Indicates whether or not this user is a system user, indicated by the SystemUserType field on User

      • UnrestrictedUser

        boolean UnrestrictedUser
        Indicates whether or not this user is the super user that should be granted all permissions.

      • VacationingUsers

        Key[] VacationingUsers
        Returns an array containing the IDs of all users that are on vacation and are backed up by this user.

      • copy

        KeyableBean copy(block(field:IEntityPropertyInfo):Boolean shouldCopy)

        Returns:

      • remove

        void remove()
        Removes the user from the system, in the process removing (retiring) its Credential and Contact records. Also sets any claims/exposures/activities that are pending assignment to this user to no longer have an assigned user

      • syncRoles

        boolean syncRoles(String[] roleNames)
        Sets the role on the user based on the role names being passed in, and remove all the old roles. This method will compare all the role names but will ignore all the roles that are not found
        Parameters:
        roleNames - names of the roles to add to the user
        Returns:
        true if modifications have been made
